channel.title: VPN on Host System?
channel.description:
I understand using a VPN *in* Whonix isnt entirely reccomended.
What about running a VPN in the host system that isnt attached to the name? Does this pose the same risks as setting a VPN up after the tor connection inside Whonix?

item.title: VPN on Host System?
item.dc:creator: 0x1f
item.description:
Tor developers recommend against it, use bridges.

Read full topic

item.title: VPN on Host System?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Introduction applies equally to, mentions VPN on the host. I recommend to search within that page for:

host

Read full topic
